name: Together We Climb
description:
Play as two characters trying to climb to the highest point on the island!

Two guys. One strong, while the other dexterous. Together, they will be able to climb the island and reach the highest point! Join them in this Puzzle Platformer and see if you can climb to the top. 

Developed Solo for the GJL Game Parade 2021.

Drop ladders to help with the climb, both to help Red join Blue and as checkpoints incase you fall. If you fall in the water, and you will be brought back to the first area.

Controls

General:

"WASD" keys to move.

"Q" to climb ladders.

"R" when at the highest point to end your climb.

Red - The Strong Character:

Click and hold the "Left Mouse Button" to move the gray rocks for Blue to climb.

Blue - The Dexterous Character:

Press "E" to drop down ladders at fences.

Hope you enjoy the game!
